directions.step:
From: ynnuf@yetti.amigans.gen.nz (Doreen Randal)
Date: Tue, 23 Nov 93 16:27:19 PST
Place mixed fruit in the warm tea with the sugar, stir until dissolved. Let cool. Add the well beaten egg to the cooled mixture, then fold in the sifted flour, mix well. Place mixture into greased and lined 9"x5" loaf tin. Bake in mod./slow oven approx. 2 hrs. or until cooked when tested. Serve sliced buttered or plain.
